title: [1.7.10]Simply Sit随处都可坐
author: falsh_asan
txt_content:
这是一个非常简单的坐下模组——
可以让你在任何方块的边缘坐下，不用家具和矿车模拟了！


站在方块接近边缘处，按下X键你就可以坐下了

ChangeLog
1.7.10-1.1.0 - Bug: Removed spam from server console/log. - Feature: You can now sit in water that is one block deep. - Bug: Fixed a bug where you did not get dismounted if you or someone else destroyed the block you where sitting on. - Improvement: Slightly better server performance! Why not ;O   1.7.10-1.0.1 - Improvement: (Optional) Sitting is required to eat, this is disabled by default and can be enabled in the config. - Bug: Fixed the mcmod.info  1.7.10-1.0.0 - Full Release
1.7.10-1.1.0
- Bug: Removed spam from server console/log.修复了BUG（是我不懂翻译）
- Feature: You can now sit in water that is one block deep.可以坐在水里了
- Bug: Fixed a bug where you did not get dismounted if you or someone else destroyed the block you where sitting on.修复了BUG
- Improvement: Slightly better server performance! Why not ;O改进性能



你可以选择在这里下载https://pan.baidu.com/s/1geNAzGB
或者是神奇的网盘
